update POS_REWARD_DETAIL
PROFIT_POS_DATE = #{profitPosDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_AGENT_ID = #{posAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_AGENT_NAME = #{posAgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POS_MECHANISM_TYPE = #{posMechanismType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
